data:
<educational_content>
# Excel High School Orientation Completion Quiz

## Introduction

Congratulations on reaching the final step of your Excel High School orientation! This quiz will assess your understanding of essential information covered during orientation. Successfully completing this assessment will earn you the "Ready to Excel" badge and unlock your course modules. The questions focus on important policies, requirements, and resources you'll need to succeed as an Excel High School student.

## Orientation Completion Quiz

Answer the following 10 multiple-choice questions. You must score 80% or higher (8 out of 10 correct) to earn your badge and proceed to your coursework.

### Question 1: What is the refund window for tuition at Excel High School?
A) 7 days from enrollment
B) 30 days from enrollment
C) 60 days from enrollment
D) 90 days from enrollment

### Question 2: What minimum device specifications are required for accessing the Excel High School learning platform?
A) Windows 10 or higher, 4GB RAM, high-speed internet
B) Any smartphone with internet access
C) Any computer or device with internet access and an updated web browser
D) Only computers less than 3 years old with premium internet service

### Question 3: How do you contact technical support at Excel High School?
A) Only by phone during business hours
B) Only through the Help Desk ticket system
C) Through the Help Desk ticket system, email, or phone during support hours
D) Only by visiting the physical campus location

### Question 4: What is the minimum acceptable score to pass most courses at Excel High School?
A) 60%
B) 70% 
C) 80%
D) 90%

### Question 5: Which of the following is NOT an acceptable academic integrity practice?
A) Using permitted online resources for research
B) Having a family member proofread your work
C) Submitting work completed by someone else as your own
D) Using citation tools to properly credit sources

### Question 6: When are you expected to complete your coursework?
A) Only during traditional school hours (8am-3pm)
B) According to your personalized learning plan and course deadlines
C) Only during live sessions with teachers
D) Whenever you want, with no deadlines

### Question 7: What is the primary method for submitting assignments at Excel High School?
A) Email to your teacher
B) Physical mail to the school address
C) Through the online learning platform's assignment submission tool
D) Verbally during video conferences

### Question 8: What should you do if you need an extension on an assignment due date?
A) Skip the assignment and take a zero
B) Contact your teacher or academic advisor before the due date
C) Submit whatever you have completed, regardless of quality
D) There are no extensions allowed under any circumstances

### Question 9: How frequently should you log in to your Excel High School account?
A) Once a month
B) At least once per week
C) Only when assignments are due
D) Daily or several times per week for active students

### Question 10: What resources are available to help you succeed at Excel High School?
A) Academic advisors only
B) Technical support only
C) Academic advisors, teachers, technical support, and online learning resources
D) No support - independent learning is required

## Badge Requirements

To earn your "Ready to Excel" badge and unlock your course modules, you must:
- Complete all 10 questions
- Score 80% or higher (at least 8 correct answers)
- Submit your quiz using the "Submit" button

Upon successful completion, the "Ready to Excel" badge will be added to your student profile, and your course modules will become available in your learning dashboard.

Good luck! Once you've earned your badge, you'll be ready to begin your educational journey with Excel High School.
</educational_content>
